EN.Title: Open Snapdrop on other devices to send files
EN.displayName: The easiest way to transfer data across devices
EN.BottomSecondTitle: You can be discovered by everyone on this network
EN.Aboutext: The easiest way to transfer files across devices

ZH.Title: 在其他设备上打开Snapdrop以发送文件
ZH.BottomSecondTitle: 在这个网络上的每个人都可以发现您!
ZH.Aboutext: 是跨设备传输文件的最简单方法
